editedFacts.rooms: Breakfast nook, Dining room, Sun room

response.homeDescription: Stately appearance, Stone & frame construction, big front porch. Beautiful entry with gorgeous original woodwork, moldings, hardwood floors throughout. Wood Columns lead you into a large living room with fireplace, gorgeous original wood built ins on both sides of the fireplace. Leaded glass doors lead into the massive formal dining room with original box beam ceiling, hardwood flooring and lovely moldings. The entry hall or dining room lead you to the eat in kitchen and a half bath on the first floor. Big sunroom, three spacious bedrooms are the second floor. The second floor full bath has been recently renovated and in keeping with the character of the home. The third floor has a king sized bedroom, full bath and currently has a kitchenette. 3rd floor would be a perfect Master suite. 2 car detached garage in the Historic Valentine/Roanoke area. Home has been lovingly and meticulously restored. This home is perfect for period furnishings or showcasing your antiques! Forced air gas furnace/central air and many updates throughout!
response.whatOwnerLoves: Original woodwork throughout, beautiful hardwood floors, box beam ceiling, oak moldings, gorgeous staircase, fireplace in formal living room with original built in corner bookcases. 4 bedrooms plus sunroom. Third floor would be an awesome master suite. 2 car garage. Beautiful 3 story in Historic Valentine.
